TopicTitle: Science Lab, Clean experiments, Action Groups

Articles.Content:
Hi all!

I'm seeking a method of some kind, be it Module Manager'd, directly edited, modifed, whatever, which will allow me to access the "clean the experiments" option through the Action Groups for the Science Lab.

Background: I am trying to make a Science Rover including a Lab, and am finding it annoying how I can 'one-button' my science tests, but that I need to manually click the lab to access the "Clean parts" option.

Anyone able to help?

Cheers,

Sam.

[Actions Everywhere](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100932) does what you want (let you put stuff into action groups that you normally can't), but I don't see anything about the science lab. Maybe ask on that thread?
